text.value: This is an example Ruleset. It shows the basic concepts of ArmyCalc and TWR 3.0. Credits go to http://gamenaminator.com/male-rpg.php for heroes names and http://www.reinerstilesets.de/ for units thumbnails.
Army can have only 1 hero for each 3 warriors units.
This warning is issued in every validation and there is nothing you can do about it.
